property.name: text
property.value: This model calculates the force on a single body and then performs a double integration to get a new position. The input is an array with the positions of all the bodies.

property.name: text
property.value: Simple forward-Euler integration to calculate velocity from acceleration.

property.name: text
property.value: Sum the forces from each of the bodies. Note that this could be modified to support multiple masses.

property.name: text
property.value: Simple forward-Euler integration to calculate position from velocity.
